author: Special Correspondent
text:
Drinking water supply will remain suspended in the following areas of the city on Wednesday and Thursday owing to shifting of pumping mains on Pachakarai Salai:

Sanjeevi Nagar, Devadhanam, Viragupettai, Mahalakshmi Nagar, Malaikovil, Nehruji Nagar, Ariyamangalam Ukkadai, Ariyamangalam, Jeganathapuram, Maliayappa Nagar, Rail Nagar, Senthaneerpuram, Sangiliandapuram, Ex-servicemen Colony, Vivekananda Nagar, J.K.Nagar, Melakalkandarkottai, Ponneripuram, Kallukuzhi, Ponmalaipatti, Central Prison, Subramaniapuram, Airport, Kamaraj Nagar, Sembattu, Khajanagar, Khajamalai, K.K.Nagar, Thendral Nagar, Anand Nagar, Sathyavanimuthu Nagar, Ayyappa Nagar, Bharathi Nagar, Puthur, Edamalaipattipudur, K.Sathanur, Anbu Nagar, Krishnamurthy Nagar, Thondaiman Nagar and Crawford.

Regular supply to these areas would be restored on Friday, Corporation Commissioner M.Vijayalakshmi said in a press release.
title: Water shutdown
